page.title: 01IN HELMSLEY
page.content: Helmsley Primary School gets valued help from parents in good reading and crafts. About 50% of pupils bus in from E. Sutton Bank andEast Moor. Helmsley is tending to be residential for retired people. Average for a modern 3 bed detached Â£55,000. This year a Scottish country dancing group formed, in July Duncombe Park Girls Prep. moved to Baldersby Park, Antiquarian Bookshop opened in old fire station, 116 place car park made. Church restauration appeal nearly halfway to Â£90,000. R.A.F. pilots like a close look at market. Wet garden openings, Ryedale House 13 June, Wytherstone House ay Pockley 30 June. Another August Victorian Victoria dress garden party for cancer research at Dale Side. Kirbymoorside brass band opened Helmsley Festival on 27 July in market place. Flower show was 26.27
